html:
12.29.18  10:53 pm   Why do you prefer to release songs individually?

      seems good and fun

12.29.18  10:49 pm   bells are so amazing

     that's true

12.29.18  10:34 pm   how often do your own songs get stuck in your head?

     during the entire time i am making them

12.29.18  10:29 pm   do you want to die

     not really

12.29.18  10:01 pm   what is flavor

     it's like shapes, of taste!

12.29.18  9:50 pm   Do you ever intentionally use whole tone scales when writing melodies? For me they have a very interesting sound but are difficult to incorporate on top of chords. 

     it's usually the chords which go into whole-tone world for a moment, and the melody is able to stay normal

12.29.18  8:35 pm   Is there a black hole? 

     that's the only thing there is

12.29.18  5:59 pm   What's your favorite board game?

      the stock market

12.29.18  5:51 pm   have you ever said a swear  word ever in yuor life

     i'm not sure

12.29.18  5:11 pm   If you had a different job what would it be?

      the person who opens and closes the door on the bus

12.29.18  4:11 pm   why are insects so annoying

      to survive

12.29.18  3:47 pm   is "good" determined by how/the manner in which people like it

      sometimes

12.29.18  3:42 pm   what's the difference between a clack box and a klack pak

     just the name

12.29.18  3:21 pm   you know when songs have "moments" of just pure hell yes... is that what you try to go for

     oh hell yes

12.29.18  2:02 pm   How are they are the how to know to how I know they know to go there?

      know

12.29.18  12:04 pm   would you rather give up happiness or sadness?

     neither one works without the other

12.29.18  10:12 am   although i love your music, there are lots of similarities in your songs, especially in terms of general structure, phrases, harmony, etc wich are very suprising at first, but now i feel like i got to know your method.
Would you rather stick to your own convention to continue creating your style and making it more transparent, or would you try to overcome this wont to create something even greater and more innovatory?

     i try every time to make it as innovative as possible while still being strong and good

      Do you even care and think about that?

     yes

      Maybe it's sometimes better not to analyze it so much?

     maybe but then someone always comes along and reminds me it could be an issue

12.29.18  9:36 am   Do you ever get tired of people thanking you for literally being the only reason their teenager passed World History? 

     parents don't say that. the kids themselves say that, where as the parents try to convince me that the video was actually some how less effective due to including the word 'fuck'

12.29.18  8:34 am   Do you have depression or something?

     no

      Some of your songs have a weird vibe.

     i thought depression was actually associated with a sort of lack of weirdness, but i am not an expert on that whatsoever

12.29.18  6:56 am   your songs all seem super meaningful to me, lyrically. a lot of the same stuff that's meaningful to me can also read as funny nonsense. i know what your lyrics mean to me, but do they mean that same thing to you?

     i won't know unless you tell me what it means to you

      am i reading too far into your lyrics?

     how far did you read

12.29.18  6:02 am   in the i just a bad thing video is the bad dream about the shapes inspired from a real bad dream you had?

     no

      Cause I saw someone saying they had a bad dream about shapes not fitting or a dream where they can't clearly shapes and it's frustrating. I think it's interesting because my "bad dreams" are like monsters and stuff

     now that i think about it it might have been inspired by apollo 13

12.29.18  5:51 am   How free is choice?

      you can adjust it in the settings

12.29.18  5:26 am   Why do horses have long faces?

     they were created in god's image

12.29.18  5:07 am   did you buy a greenscreen by any chance

     yes

12.29.18  4:34 am   what's your thoughts on potatoes?

      it's like a lump. for dinner!

12.29.18  1:20 am   Do you feel being open-minded in terms of spiritual experiences excludes considering that a belief system which is exclusivist could be correct?

      no

12.29.18  1:08 am   Are you a competitive person?

     no

      Do you feel the need to be better than?

     yes

12.29.18  1:06 am   I really like your negative songs about bad things and mt. st helens blowing up. Keep up the bad work and please stop trying to be so positive

     i've discovered a cool songwriting trick which is to have lyrics about bad things but make the music sound very good. it is something a lot of songwriters probably do, or at least they should try it if they have not yet. seems to be very effective, again and again

12.29.18  12:49 am   How did you react to winning the shorty award a while back?

      decided to pull the old 'thank you' trick

12.29.18  12:33 am   Did you have parents or family with conservative Christian beliefs?

     no

      And if so, are any of your lyrics a figurative 'thumbing your nose' to them?

     no

12.28.18  11:58 pm   best word in the dictionary

     dictionarily (in a dictionary like manner)

12.28.18  11:47 pm   why are you so good at making music?

      i am hoping this could make me elligible for some awards and prizes

12.28.18  10:44 pm   I want to do art. 

      that makes sense

12.28.18  9:17 pm   do you like jot down ideas in a notebook or something and then end up with a song? I.E. "uhh im gonna write a song but its gonna be 'bad' so im gonna call it I just did a bad thing. haha well i just got a quote so im gonna put that in my I just did a bad thing list. oh wait. its a song now."
 

     i was going to say no but actually yes that is pretty much how it is, but there is a little more to it after that

12.28.18  8:09 pm   do you ever deliberately reference one song/video you've done in another song/video,

     not usually

      if so can you please give an example 

     in 'long long journey' when they went to the movies, i used one of my videos for the movie. mostly because of the easy access and rights

12.28.18  7:05 pm   how do i find the right creative medium to express my thoughts in

     all of them are wrong, but try them and see which one you seem to enjoy the most

12.28.18  6:51 pm   I play a B flat trumpet and know like 5 notes. Am I the next Mozart?

     everyone is the next mozart. since the time of mozart, everyone has been mozart

12.28.18  6:39 pm   Will there be a third part to the "History Of" series?

     if there is it would hopefully change the presumed title of the 'series'

      Also, are squares superior to circles? Asking for a friend.

     no

12.28.18  6:23 pm   what is the best way to use the minor fourth (iv) chord?

     each person must decide which one they think is their favorite, or actually you don't have to decide, but you can if you want. and even if you do, i suspect you may hear another way later that you will think is your favorite at that time, but i can't stop you from trying to choose a favorite if you want to. but what i cannot do is pick your favorite

12.28.18  6:05 pm   on average, how many costume changes are necessary to make a video featuring the bill wurtz band?

     the way you would calculate that, and i have not taken the time to do it, is you would go through the videos and add up the number of costumes in each video, add them all together and divide by the number of videos

12.28.18  6:02 pm   will your ever take a break to try out more hobbies 

     yes

12.28.18  5:48 pm   will you add more videos in the reality category i enjoy them a lot  

     yes

12.28.18  5:23 pm   Will you ever have merch??

     i already do but i hate it so i was thinking of cancelling it

12.28.18  5:16 pm   would you ever guest-judge a competition show 

     i'd like to judge the judges. put them in their place for once

12.28.18  5:09 pm   do you have a counter for all your curses on this site

      it is just 1 all purpose curse. (curse-all)

12.28.18  4:36 pm   are you ever going to put ads on your videos?

     some types, on some platforms, on some videos

12.28.18  4:15 pm   which dimension are you from

      (up, left, forward)

12.28.18  4:10 pm   If we're always worrying about what our purpose is here on Earth, are we missing the purpose? 

     no

12.28.18  3:17 pm   do pets really see ghosts

      only if the pet is also a ghost. (ghost pet)

12.28.18  2:30 pm   Lately I've been obsessed with how things change over the years. I do stuff like go on google maps and look up street views from 2007. Is this normal?

     even better
